name: Blastarix the smart AI operating system for Neurochips
tagline: Blastarix operating system, artificial intelligence, nanochips, neurochips, smart glasses, wearable computers
body:
### Welcome to Blastarix a fork of GNU/Linux for Neurochips and other smart devices.


### Authors and Contributors
@ErisBlastar @OrionBlastar @RushGorden @Cable2600c @GeneralRAM are currently working together on this project and need your help.

### Support or Contact
http://blastar.in/
http://blastar.in/linux/
http://blastar.in/contact.html/

http://www.amazon.com/America-The-Enslaved-Neurochip-ebook/dp/B007LAX6YY
